headline: Hi, I'm Alex. Welcome, to my portfolio!
summary: I am a final-year undergraduate student, pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science.
My enthusiasm lies in tackling complex problems and providing efficient, scalable solutions.
My specific interests revolve around backend and full-stack development, where I've honed my skills in multiple programming languages, databases, and frameworks.
I have a keen interest in microservices architecture, where I am intrigued by its power to create robust, scalable, and maintainable applications.
